name: The Chainsaw Incident
blurb: A hand-drawn, unique fighting game forged by the minds that brought you Tekken, Virtua Fighter, Soul Calibur and more.

rewards.reward: No Reward
$1.00 Instant special thanks in credits

THE TIP JAR - $1 \r\n\u2022 Sure, it's only four quarters, but that was a lot of play back in the day (depending on how good you were!). Every dollar counts and we sincerely appreciate your support! Thank you!
